text: Anne-Ségolène Abscheidt is a French professor and naval engineer. Since June 2023, she is the Director of the Institut Polytechnique des Sciences Avancées, a French aerospace College. She is also Vice-President of Ingénieurs et scientifiques de France. Abscheidt Graduates with a Master's degree from the École navale in 1997,Anne-Ségolène ABSCHEIDT the she became operational manager at the Ministry of Defense in Brest and Toulon from 1997 to 2005. She took up the direction of communication and partnerships for the Lorraine Region.ANNE-SÉGOLÈNE ABSCHEIDT From 2007 to 2013, Anne-Ségolène Abscheidt worked on restructuring projects at the Ministry of Defense in Paris.Exemple d’une trajectoire de dirigeante avec Anne-Ségolène ABSCHEIDT On top of that (2009-2013), she worked on business plans for several business projects. Since 2013, she founded Orientalis Conseil, a start-up specializing in advice and training for young people.Le point stratégie d’Anne-Ségolène Abscheidt Anne- Ségolène Abscheidt was previously head of training at the EIGSI La Rochelle engineering school since October 2020. She was head of the ESCEM management schoolLes femmes de l'économie : comment réseauter en régions between April 2016 and June 2020.Tours : à l'Escem, pari réussi pour Anne-Ségolène Abscheidt From February 2022 to May 2023, she is head of training of Eductive, French educational company.Nomination : Anne-Ségolène Abscheidt est élue directrice académique du réseau Eductive The 1st of June 2023, she is nominated Director of the Institut Polytechnique des Sciences Avancées, replacing Valérie Cornetet. She is also Vice-President of Ingénieurs et scientifiques de France.Le conseil d'administration ==References== ==Further reading== * Académie nationale de l'air et de l'espace and Lucien Robineau, Les français du ciel, dictionnaire historique, Le Cherche midi, June 2005, 782 p. () * Le futur de l'avion : Les prochains défis de l’industrie aéronautique, Ivry-sur- Seine, FYP Éditions, 2020, 160 p. (ISBN 978-2-36405-203-1) Category:Living people Category:French engineers Category:Marine engineers
title: Anne-Ségolène Abscheidt
